title: What is the Wimbledon tennis schedule?
description: The No. 1 player in the PIF ATP Rankings Jannik Sinner and seven-time champion Novak Djokovic will play their fourth-round matches at Wimbledon on Monday. View the day's featured matches below and the full order of play here. Wimbledon

What is the Wimbledon tennis schedule?

Sinner and Djokovic among stars in action Monday

July 06, 2025

AELTC/THOMAS LOVELOCK/POOL/AFP via Getty Images

The Championships, Wimbledon will be held at the All England Club from 30 June - 13 July. By ATP Staff

The No. 1 player in the PIF ATP Rankings Jannik Sinner and seven-time champion Novak Djokovic will play their fourth-round matches at Wimbledon on Monday.

View the day's featured matches below and the full order of play here.

Centre Court (starts 1:30 p.m.) 
[11] Alex de Minaur (AUS) vs. [6] Novak Djokovic (SRB)
[7] Mirra Andreeva vs. [10] Emma Navarro (USA)
[1] Jannik Sinner vs. [19] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL)

No. 1 Court (starts 1 p.m.)
[19] Ekaterina Alexandrova vs. Belinda Bencic (SUI)
[10] Ben Shelton (USA) vs. Lorenzo Sonego (ITA)
[8] Iga Swiatek (POL) vs. [23] Clara Tauson (DEN)

Pump it up: Djokovic’s daughter Tara steals Wimbledon show with celebration dance
'Pain-free' Dimitrov ready for Sinner clash following retirement nightmare
